text: Why would you risk this?  In this group of #patients 4 mths post hospitalisation with #COVID19 8.2% reported #pulmonaryembolism.  22 cases with #astrazenecavaccine in ~17,000,000 people.... i.e. ~60,000 times LESS likely to have a #clot with the #vaccine than with COVID https://t.co/6AZaXLFO4p
